attributes.action: Knight major Tim peake for services to education
attributes.background: Tim Peake is using his time on the international space station to educate and enthuse children about science and space exploration, he is a truly great brit and I feel this should be recognised at the highest level.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  
 
Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
